Theme: United

This is an example of layout built using bootstrap united theme

To use it as your default theme youâ€™ve to change layout configuration in your _config.yml, for example:

defaults:
 -
    scope:
      path: ""
    values:
      layout: "git-wiki-bs-united"
 -
    scope:
      path: ""
      type: "pages"
    values:
      layout: "git-wiki-bs-united"
